pageAttributes.summary: Over the years my home network has been powered by Ubiquiti hardware - nano HD APs, an in-wall AP, a Flex AP, an Outdoor Mesh, network switch, and a USG...
Since starting this blog shortly before the pandemic began, I've been very inconsistent in my writing...
I've been at Lumigo for 6 weeks now, and it's been an eye-opening experience...
I'm now almost two months into my new journey, and it's time to provide an update!...
After nearly 11 years at Red Hat it's time to move onto a new challenge...
It's been over a year since I first created this blog with the goal of posting more...
